item.title: Richest Customer Wealth
item.description: Intuition I’d sum each row, find the one with the highest value and then return that value. Approach Complexity Time complexity: $O(m * n)$ Space complexity: Code

item.title: Running Sum of 1D Array
item.description: Intuition First I thought about just summing index 1, not 0, with the previous element (e.g.: i - 1). However, the output needs to be an integer array.

item.title: Started working on Leetcode
item.description: I downloaded the Coding Interview book and here is all the solutions on Leetcode.
